landing.title: Schedule Your Donation, Save Lives
landing.subtitle: Book your blood or plasma donation online in minutes. Join thousands of donors making a difference every day.
landing.donorRegistrationDesc: New to Vitalita? Register as a donor or login to your existing account to manage appointments.
landing.bookDonationDesc: Our advanced booking system will guide you step by step through the process. Complete eligibility checking, smart scheduling, and instant confirmation.

processSteps.step1: Start the Conversation - Use our advanced booking wizard or chat with the virtual assistant
processSteps.step2: Identity Verification - Secure identification with your name, AWS center, and donor ID with birth generation
processSteps.step3: Eligibility & Scheduling - Advanced eligibility checking and smart scheduling with real-time availability
processSteps.step4: Instant Confirmation - Multiple delivery options, QR codes, calendar integration and automated reminders
